content: Hello Bitcoin Forum members,We are excited to introduce Raptor CyberPunk, a trailblazing project in the blockchain space that aims to push the boundaries of innovation and artistic exploration.What sets Raptor CyberPunk apart is not only our robust tokenomics but also our dedication towards fostering aRaptor CyberPunk is driven by the community, for the community. To ensure a fair distribution, we have an enticing proposal for all of you: a $1000 Airdrop to be shared amongst participants!Here's how to participate:Visit and Like our Twitter: https://twitter.com/RaptorCyberPunkJoin our Telegram: https://t.me/RaptorCyberCheck out our website: https://www.raptorcyber.wtf/Comment on this post with your ETH address.We believe in rewarding our early supporters. This is your chance to be a part of something exceptional. Remember, participation is open to all but the rewards are for the early birds!Let's revolutionize the world of crypto together. We can't wait for you to join our journey!Best Regards,Raptor CyberPunk Team.Presale Address: https://www.pinksale.finance/launchpad/0xF2dC44bB3026050dD5F45466C6a2ec707Fba8fbC?chain=ETHToken Name: Raptor CyberPunkToken Symbol: CYBERToken Decimals: 9Token Address: 0xeC2F64C252F9904ED26477B2F8ACaCDD88b8FB25Total Supply: 7,000,000,000 CYBERTokens For Presale: 4,379,999,996 CYBERTokens For Liquidity: 2,189,123,998.0008 CYBERSoft Cap: 1 ETHPresale Start Time: 2023.07.04 15:15 (UTC)Presale End Time: 2023.07.07 18:00 (UTC)Note: The distribution of airdrop rewards will be conducted after the Presale ends, and we will contact all successful participants directly. Thank you and good luck!Disclaimer: Please do your research before investing. Always manage your risk properly.
